amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit the Indian Health Service from using appropriated funds to provide sex-transition surgeries or treatment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
